benchmark_details.name: VL2NL (Visual Language to Natural Language)
benchmark_details.overview: VL2NL is a Large Language Model framework that generates rich and diverse natural language datasets using Vega-Lite specifications, aimed at streamlining the development of Natural Language Interfaces (NLIs) for data visualization.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To generate diverse NL datasets for enhancing Natural Language Interfaces (NLIs) for data visualization.

methodology.calculation: Accuracy is evaluated based on strict and lenient criteria for the correctness of chart semantics and generated captions.
methodology.interpretation: Achieved an accuracy of 89.4% for chart semantics and 76.0% for L1 captions under strict criteria.
methodology.validation: Validated through quantitative and qualitative analyses.
